activity: Preterite vs Imperfect Drill (Mixed AR/ER/IR) - 15 Questions
done_condition: after 15 questions are completed and reviewed
prompt: Quiz me on the difference between the Preterite (Indefinido) and Imperfect (Imperfecto) tenses in Spanish. Mix -AR, -ER, and -IR verbs. Total: 15 questions. Use a mix of fill-in-the-blank sentences and translation tasks. Focus on triggers like 'ayer', 'siempre', 'mientras', and 'de repente'. Correct my answers and explain the logic for each choice. Use Castilian Spanish with vosotros.
